question_text: $\text{If } A=\begin{bmatrix}1 & 2\\2 & 4\end{bmatrix}, \text{ then } A^{-1} \text{ does not exist because}$

option_a: $\text{the determinant of coefficient matrix is zero}$
option_b: $\text{the system has more variables than equations}$
option_c: $\text{the determinant of coefficient matrix is non-zero}$
